===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*na-n/t||ill, pain, difficult, evil spirit}}.

Cognate with {{cog|bo|མནར||to suffer; suffering}}, {{m|bo|ན||to be sick, ill}}, {{m|bo|ནན་ཏེ||sick, ill}}, {{m|bo|ནད||disease, suffering}}, {{cog|my|နာ||to suffer pain, to be ill}}, {{m|my|နတ်||{{w|nat (spirit)}}, evil spirit}}.
